_description: Life of St Agatha in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
[A]gatha þe madine clereves cumyne of gentil kyn but
                    vere…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…owt of þis wrechit warld twynebut sudende ded schame
                    & syne
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 2.157-62.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.358-67.
